dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.crop_health_card_description: Upload an image to detect pests and diseases in your crops instantly.
dashboard.farming_plans_card_description: Get AI-powered advice to optimize your farming practices and boost yield.
dashboard.weather_alerts_card_description: Receive hyperlocal weather updates and predictive pest/disease alerts.
dashboard.marketplace_card_description: Buy and sell seeds, fertilizers, and other agricultural inputs.
dashboard.forums_card_description: Connect with other farmers, share knowledge, and ask questions.

crop_health.title: Crop Health
crop_health.form_description: Upload a photo of a plant and add a description to get an AI-generated health report.
crop_health.description_placeholder: e.g., Yellow spots on leaves, wilting stems...
crop_health.report_description: The analysis of your crop will appear here.

farming_plans.title: Personalized Farming Plans
farming_plans.form_description: Provide details about your farm to receive a personalized plan for optimizing yield and reducing waste.
farming_plans.farm_details_placeholder: e.g., 5-acre farm in Punjab, sandy loam soil, temperate climate.
farming_plans.current_practices_placeholder: e.g., Flood irrigation twice a week, manual pest control.
farming_plans.plan_description: Your AI-generated recommendations will appear here.

weather_alerts.title: Weather & Pest Alerts
weather_alerts.form_description: Enter your location and crop to get AI-powered predictive alerts.
weather_alerts.forecast_description_static: Weather information and alerts will be displayed here.

forums.title: Community Forums
forums.topic1_title: Best practices for wheat cultivation in dry regions?
forums.topic1_excerpt: I'm looking for advice on water-efficient irrigation techniques and drought-resistant wheat varieties. What has worked for you all in areas with less rainfall? Any specific government schemes I should look into?
forums.topic2_title: Organic pesticide recommendations for tomato plants
forums.topic2_excerpt: My tomato crop is suffering from whitefly infestation. I want to avoid chemical pesticides. Can anyone suggest effective organic solutions? I've heard about neem oil but would like to know more options.
forums.topic3_title: How to get a fair price at the local mandi?
forums.topic3_excerpt: The prices I'm being offered for my potato harvest seem very low compared to the market rate. What are some negotiation strategies or platforms I can use to connect directly with buyers and get a better price?

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Enter your email to receive a magic link to sign in.
login.success_message: If an account with this email exists, a magic link has been sent to your inbox.
